sect1.title: Adapters for Zend_Translate
sect1.para: Zend_Translate can handle different adapters for translation. Each adapter has it's own pros and cons. So the decission which adapter to use is different depending on your or your customers needs.

row.entry: Small pages, simplest useage, only for programmers
Gnu standard for linux, very fast, threadsave, needs tools for translation
Simple text file format, very fast, possible problems with unicode characters
Industry standard for inter application translation, xml format, human readable
Different other adapters are supposed to be implemented in the future but not ready for now

sect2.title: Zend_Translate Array Adapter
sect2.para: The array adapter is the simplest of our translation adapters. And it is the simplest in it's useage.
